Constructor Detail

public IncidentalExpense()

Method Detail

isEmpty

public boolean isEmpty()
Checks if the incidental expense is empty. To do this it checks if all the attributes are set to the same values as they were set to in the constructor. This is necessary for the FormDataConverter to determine if in the process of constructing the expense we have an empty expense or a partial expense.

Overrides:
isEmpty in class PerDiemExpense
Returns:
- true if none of the fields in this expense have been set, false otherwise.
